title: World’s shortest man dies at age 75
content:
LONDON – The world’s shortest man, as verified by the Guinness Book of Records, has died of an undisclosed illness in American Samoa, a hospital spokeswoman said Friday. 
 
Nepal’s Chandra Bahadur Dangi, who was 21.5 inches (54.6 cm) tall, died late Thursday at the Lyndon B. Johnson Tropical Medical Center in Pago Pago.
